string-array.name: help_string_array_questions
string-array.item: Why is the menu not updated?
Where do they get Balance and Meter information?
Why are Internet and camera permissions needed?
What does \"Barcode dependencies are not yet available.\" mean?
Do I need Internet to check my card balance?

string-array.name: help_string_array_answers
string-array.item:
We are two very hungry FaMAF students.

 	The app started just as a hobby to learn the Java/Android programming language, so we strive to polish it as much as we can in our free time.

 Development: Alejandro Ismael Silva
 		alex.sai95@gmail.com

 Icon, banner and a multitude of opinions: Julieta Wiesztort
 		juli.nana.07@gmail.com

We get the menu from the university's website:

 www.unc.edu.ar/vida-estudiantil/men%C3%BA-de-la-semana

 	If the menu doesn't refresh, it must be because the university did not update it.

From the university dining room's website:

 	Balance: comedor.unc.edu.ar/autoconsulta.php

 	Meter: comedor.unc.edu.ar/cocina.php
\tInternet access is necessary for updating the menu, the balance and the measurer.\n \tCamera access is for adding the card by scanning the barcode on it.

\tTo add a card using the camera, we use Google Play Services\'s \"Vision\" library. If this library is not available on the device, it will be downloaded automatically in the background (keep in mind that you need storage space available for the download, if you don\'t have enough room, a warning will appear).\n\n \tTry again after a few minutes. If you are in a hurry or don\'t have Google Play Services, you can add it manually by entering the code with the keyboard.
\tAll the data is stored on the device to check offline, but you need to be connected to the Internet to get it updated.

If you are developer, you can collaborate with code in the Github repository:
 		github.com/AIDEA775/UNCmorfi

 	If you have a suggestion or doubt, you can send it by e-mail in the "Contact" option of the navigation bar menu.

 	Otherwise, you can recommend the app to anyone you see in the dining room row ;)
